Compliance description: Assess whether the code includes checks to maintain data quality and consistency throughout preprocessing.
Verify if the code specifies the deployment platform (on-premises, cloud, or edge devices).
Ensure the code implements authentication, authorization, and encryption for model security.
Check if the code computes relevant metrics such as accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score for classification, or RMSE, MAE for regression.
Check if the code identifies patterns in incorrect predictions and provides insights for improvement.
Assess whether the code includes techniques to detect and mitigate model biases against specific groups.
Check if the code evaluates the modelâ€™s generalization ability using a validation set.
Verify if the code properly defines loss functions (e.g., MSE, cross-entropy) and optimization methods (SGD, Adam).
Verify if the code logs key metrics like accuracy, latency, and throughput in production.
Verify if the code includes strategies for handling failures, security threats, or biases.
